job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pLooking for a Data Scientist to work with financial data on a great team and a fantastic organization You can work remotely but would prefer someone in the Tampa Bay areanbspppbrppThis role will support multiple divisions within the organization The focus of this role includes using data to develop and deliver the information necessary for making business decisions and providing actionable intelligence that allows senior management to better manage the businessnbspThis person should be able to interpret data analyzing results using various techniques and extracting information which can offer ways to improve products and business approaches thus influencing business decisions You will lead projects including communications with IT as well as key business stakeholdersnbspYou will provide the sales leaders data they need to guide the business from models built based on current statisticsppbrppRequirementspulliPrefer 35 years using data to build models to provide to business leaders but will consider those with 12 years of data science experience as wellliliFamiliarity with statistical modeling techniquesliliFamiliarity with statistical and general programming languages such as R andor Python Python preferredliliMust have solid SQL experiencenbspnbspliliCustomer centric analysis profitability analysis and modelingliliBachelors degree Required Masters a plusliliAble to work independently with minimum supervisionnbspnbspnbspliliAble to maintain confidentiality of sensitive informationnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspliliPrefer someone who lives in Tampa Bay arealiliMUST LIVE IN THE ET OR CT TIME ZONESliliNo 3rd parties no sponsorship availableliul
